phase.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: one of the stages of a process of development or change
phase.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: a new drug that is in the experimental phase

phase.translation[0].definitions[1].defi: one of a fixed number of changes in the appearance of the Moon or a planet  when it is seen from the Earth
phase.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to make something happen gradually in a planned way

a phased withdrawal of military forces
phase.translation[2].definitions[0].defi: a part of a process of development or growth
